# Dailies by Position

## Catcher Dailies

### Receiving Progression:

*  Weighted ball rolls (10 - 15) no glove
*  Weighted ball short hops (10 -15) no glove
*  Weighted ball high pitches (10 - 15) no glove
*  Fastballs with glove
*  Change pitches

##  First Base Dailies

*  Catch a ball off the wall 10x in front of your face
*  Stride out and catch a ball in front of your face 10x
*  Pick a ball off a wall 10x
*  Pick a ball off a wall on your knee 10x
*  Pick a ball from your partner on your knee 10x
*  Start on the bag and pick a ball from your partner 10x
